rows.label: tlk44200185_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, so... Is our Divine Beast gonna wind up
sinking into the Cloud Sea one day,
just like in "The Millenarian Divine Beast"?

rows.label: tlk44200185_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, don't you know that book?
The story follows a Divine Beast for the
entire long course of its life.

rows.label: tlk44200185_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Towards the end, the exhausted Divine Beast
grows colder and colder, until no one
can stop it sinking beneath the clouds...

rows.label: tlk44200185_03_msg0004
rows.name:
What? You mean, you're gonna
try and save our Divine Beast somehow?
Wow, you're like real heroes!
